headline: Evercore ISI Cuts AbbVie Inc. (ABBV) PT, Says Consensus for 2026 and 2027 Still Looks Beatable
summary: AbbVie Inc. (NYSE:ABBV) is included among the 13 Best Roth IRA Stocks to Buy Now. On February 5, Evercore ISI analyst Gavin Clark-Gartner trimmed his price recommendation on AbbVie Inc. (NYSE:ABBV) to $228 from $232. The analyst maintained an Outperform rating on the stock. In a note to investors, he said that despite Tremfya continuing […]
